src:
Foto: Na Floride pochytali viac ako 3600 pytónov, samica merala viac ako päť a pol metra
05 Nov 2019, 08:35 by Webnoviny
5.11.2019 (Webnoviny.sk) – Na Floride pochytali viac ako 3600 pytónov tmavých (Python bivittatus) v rámci programu na záchranu ekosystému Everglades, ktorý podľa odborníkov tieto „agresívne“ zvieratá ohrozujú.
Guvernér Ron DeSantis v pondelok uviedol, že Python Action Team chytil tisíc hadov a v rámci štátneho programu na elimináciu pytónov chytili ďalších 2600 týchto zvierat. Oba projekty odštartovali v roku 2017. Minulý mesiac sa im pritom podarilo chytiť samicu pytóna, ktorá bola dlhá 5,58 metra a mala hmotnosť 45 kilogramov. Odborníci tvrdia, že je to najväčší pytón, akého kedy chytili v Big Cypress National Preserve.
Experti uviedli, že pytóny eliminovali v Everglades 99 percent pôvodných cicavcov, vrátane zajacov a líšok, a zdecimovali zdroje potravy pre niektoré tamojšie druhy, ako napríklad aligátory.
Viac k témam: pytónZdroj: Webnoviny.sk – Foto: Na Floride pochytali viac ako 3600 pytónov, samica merala viac ako päť a pol metra © SITA Všetky práva vyhradené.
text:
Photo: In Florida they collected more than 3600 bags, the female measured more than five and a half meters
05 Nov 2019, 08:35 by Webnoviny
5.11.2019 (Webnoviny.sk) - In Florida, more than 3,600 bags of python (Python bivittatus) have been captured as part of the Everglades ecosystem conservation program, according to experts, threatening these "aggressive" animals.
Governor Ron DeSantis said Monday that the Python Action Team had caught a thousand snakes and had captured an additional 2,600 of these animals as part of a state bag elimination program. Both projects started in 2017. Last month they managed to catch a female bag, which was 5.58 meters long and weighed 45 kilograms. Experts say it's the biggest bag they've ever caught in the Big Cypress National Preserve.
Experts said the bags eliminated 99 percent of native mammals, including hares and foxes, in the Everglades, and decimated food sources for some species there, such as alligators.
More on Topics: SackSource: Webnoviny.sk - Photo: Florida has captured more than 3600 bags, female measured more than five and a half meters © SITA All rights reserved.
